name: NSPopover
desc: A means to display additional content related to existing content on the screen.

items.desc: The view controller that manages the content of the popover.

items.name: var behavior: NSPopover.Behavior
items.desc: Specifies the behavior of the popover.

items.name: func show(relativeTo: NSRect, of: NSView, preferredEdge: NSRectEdge)
items.desc: Shows the popover anchored to the specified view.

items.name: var positioningRect: NSRect
items.desc: The rectangle within the positioning view relative to which the popover should be positioned.

items.name: var appearance: NSAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance of the popover.

items.name: var animates: Bool

items.name: var contentSize: NSSize

items.name: var isShown: Bool

items.name: var isDetached: Bool

items.desc: The delegate of the popover.

items.name: enum NSPopover.Behavior
items.desc: The appearance and disappearance behavior of a popover.

items.name: class let closeReasonUserInfoKey: String
items.desc: The userInfo key containing the reason for the willCloseNotification.

items.desc: Values that specify the reason for the willCloseNotification notification.

items.name: class let willShowNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Sent before the popover is shown.

items.name: class let didShowNotification: NSNotification.Name

items.name: class let willCloseNotification: NSNotification.Name
